metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9527 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
HSLFSlideShow in Apache POI before 3.11 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (infinite loop and deadlock) via a crafted PPT file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9527` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache-poi-java - 3.10.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libapache-poi-java package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.10.1-2').
